jobTitle: Data Scientist - Full Time up to 120K - Chicago, IL or Tempe, AZ
jobDescription: Title: Data Scientist  Location: Chicago, IL or Tempe, AZ  Length: Full Time  Rate: up to $120K + bonus  Visa Status: US or GC only  Description:  A leader in the banking industry is looking for a Data Scientist to join the Engineering Monitoring Groups Data Analytics Team. In this role you will be involved with using tools and technology to implement solutions that enable software system to recommend or automate data-driven decisions. This role will require the ability to perform both exploratory Data Science work as well as develop explanatory solutions and implement reactive autonomous systems.  Responsibilities:  This role will work on the Infrastructure Data Analytics Team to create solutions which increase stability, create clarity, and reduce the operational costs of highly visible applications and software systems for Northern Trust. These solutions require the use of Big Data tools such as Splunk, ELK, and Hadoop, as well as integration with tools such as Service-Now.
